description: Michael Brandon has got to be one of the most accommodating tops in the business - - small fists, pervert tongue, deep throat and that legendary Monster between his legs - - he knows how to please a bottom! Just ask Sky Donovan, who gets serviced from head to toe, inside and out, by Brandon in Scene Four. You'll match Donovan moan for moan as Brandon licks, sucks and fists him to an earth-shattering climax!
title: Wristrider
